title: Fix: Duplicate sprite name warning
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Gap from phase-0-gaps.md:

Spec requirement (docs/spec/format.md - Error Handling):
- Duplicate name â†’ Last definition wins â†’ Warning: 'Duplicate sprite name X, using latest'

Current behavior: Both sprites rendered, no warning.

Required fix in src/cli.rs:
1. Track seen sprite names in a HashSet
2. When duplicate detected:
   - Lenient mode: warn and skip (keep first, not last per spec clarification)
   - OR warn and replace (keep last per spec)
   - Strict mode: error and fail

Verification:
```
./target/release/pxl render tests/fixtures/lenient/duplicate_name.jsonl -o /tmp/dupe.png 2>&1 | grep -i warning
```
Should show: Warning: Duplicate sprite name 'dupe', using latest
close_reason: Implemented duplicate sprite name detection with warning. Latest definition wins in lenient mode, fails in strict mode.
